snippet: Representative Todd Akin, abandoned by the Republican establishment after his controversial comments on rape months ago, is seeing an influx of more than $2 million in the final days of his campaign.
abstract: Representative Todd Akin, abandoned by the Republican establishment after his controversial comments on rape months ago, is seeing an influx of more than $2 million in the final days of his campaign.

headline.main: Akin Finds Funding in Final Days of Senate Race
